knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
malaria <- read_csv("malaria.csv") %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
malaria_long %>% 
  filter(data_date=="2020-07-30") %>% 
  group_by(district) %>% 
  summarize(tot_cases=sum(cases, na.rm=T)) %>% 
  arrange(-tot_cases)
```

```{r}
malaria_long <- malaria %>% 
  pivot_longer(col=starts_with("malaria_rdt"),
    names_to="age",
    values_to="cases") %>% 
  select(data_date, submitted_date, location_name, district, age, cases)
```
